apps.name: Virtual Heart Rate Monitor
apps.subtitle: Share Fitbit HR with exercise equipment
apps.localizedDescription:
Virtual Heart Rate Monitor creates a mock Bluetooth Low Energy heart rate monitor that broadcasts real-time heart rate data from your Fitbit watch.

This lets you share heart rate data with exercise equipment like Peloton, or fitness apps like Strava, Zwift, and Wahoo.

How it works:
• Install the companion Fitbit watch app from the Fitbit Gallery
• Start the HR Service app on your Fitbit watch
• Start Virtual Heart Rate Monitor on your iOS device
• Your device will appear as a Bluetooth heart rate monitor to other equipment

Requirements:
• A Fitbit Sense or Versa 3 smart watch
• The "HR Service" Fitbit watch app (available in Fitbit Gallery)
• iOS 15.6 or later

Features:
• Real-time heart rate broadcasting
• Standard Bluetooth Low Energy heart rate monitor protocol
• Works with any equipment that supports Bluetooth HR monitors
• Background mode support for continuous operation

Originally created by @mogenson, expanded by @randalln with contributions from @cwcpers.
